跴字的基本解释

跴
cǎi
同“踩”。

跴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cǎi］
亦作“跴1”。
(1)踩踏；脚底接触地面或物体。
(2)走，行走。
(3)侦查；察看。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cǎi］
Also known as "stomach 1".
(1) Step on; the sole of the foot touches the ground or an object.
(2) Walk, walk.
(3) Investigation; inspection.
